item.title: Does it still make sense to use em rather than px?
item.description: ⚠️ Warning: this is an old article and may include information that’s out of date. ⚠️ Alex Kessinger tweeted asking if there was a reason to still use EMs instead of PX measurements in mobile. This is an interesting question, but 140 characters isn’t quite enough to explain my thoughts. So here’s an old-fashioned blog post! Just a quick review: em and percentage (%) units in CSS are relative measurements, whereas px and other measurements are not.
